space.arim.api.concurrent

Interface EnhancedExecutor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Executor
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsyncExecution, SyncExecution
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAsyncExecution, DefaultAsyncExecution, DefaultAsyncExecution, DefaultSyncExecution, DefaultSyncExecution, DefaultSyncExecution, SimpleExecutor

    public interface EnhancedExecutor
extends Executor
    A Executor with upgraded concurrent functionality. Differs from ExecutorService in that it contains no methods for thread pool management (such as shutdown, await termination, etc.) but focuses specifically on concurrent execution.

    Specifications:
    * Requires Executor.execute(Runnable)
    * EnhancedExecutor provides default implementations for all of its own specifications.

    Default implementations:
    Adds submit(Runnable) and submit(Callable). Both of these methods' default implementations are pulled from AbstractExecutorService.
    Author:
    A248

      Submits a callable.
      default Future<?> submit(Runnable command)
      Execute an asynchronous action.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.concurrent.Executor

        execute

    • Method Detail

      • submit

        default Future<?> submit(Runnable command)
        Execute an asynchronous action.
        Differs from Executor.execute(java.lang.Runnable) in that the returned Future provides the ability to cancel the task before completion.
        Parameters:
        command - the Runnable to run
        Returns:
        a cancellable future which will return null on Future.get()

      • submit

        default <T> Future<T> submit(Callable<T> task)
        Submits a callable.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the callable
        Parameters:
        task - the callable itself
        Returns:
        a future
